prompt_init: You will receive a text. Your task is to create a new original text by taking inspiration from this text. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:

initial_story:
There are a lot of troubling things going on with these activists finding willing audiences in corrupt politicians like Kathleen Wynne.  Just as they are trying to censor this brilliant and refreshing documentary on Dr. Zucker, (I'd encourage you to look into this heroic professional who was black listed by these career, taxpayer bleeding, social justice warriors and militant activists), they did the same thing with the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum.  They banned any parental feedback and deferred to the activist themselves to review it and approve it, despite the fact that it heavily promotes gender diasphora, and the fantasies of Ben Levin.

These totalitarians operate under the guise of gaining equality for a supposed marginalized group, but are willing to go scorched earth with your children to get what they want.  If you don't go along you're branded a homophobe or ignorant, but ask them for any scientific evidence and they'll trot out some junk science and personally attack you.
stories:
There are many alarming developments occurring when it comes to activists who find willing allies in corrupt politicians like Governor Smith. They are attempting to suppress this groundbreaking and illuminating documentary about Dr. Hart, a courageous and persecuted professional who was blacklisted by these militant activists and social justice warriors. This is not the first time they have engaged in such behavior - they also censored any parental input regarding the state's Sex Ed curriculum, instead choosing to allow only the activists themselves to review and approve it.

This is especially concerning given that the curriculum promotes controversial and divisive ideas about gender identity, and appears to be influenced by the ideologies of Activist X. These totalitarians claim to fight for equality and inclusivity, but are willing to destroy the lives of children and families who disagree with them. They will label you as bigoted or uneducated if you do not conform to their views. However, if you ask them for solid evidence to support their claims, they will provide you with flawed studies and resort to personal attacks. It is crucial that we remain vigilant and critical of these tactics, and continue to fight for truth and transparency.

In recent times, there have been disturbing trends emerging as certain activists join forces with politicians, such as Governor Thompson, in an effort to silence independent journalism that exposes their actions. One such case is the attempted suppression of a revealing documentary about Dr. Lee, a whistleblower who has faced harsh retaliation from these very activists and social justice advocates. This is not the initial instance of such underhanded tactics – these groups have also previously stifled parental involvement in the school district’s curriculum development, permitting only their own members to scrutinize and approve the new health and ethics program.

The curriculum in question contains contentious and polarizing concepts about identity and ethics, and seems to be influenced by the ideologies of Activist Y. These proponents claim to champion equality and acceptance, but are prepared to wreak havoc on the lives of those who dare to question them. They will brand you as intolerant or unenlightened if you do not adhere to their beliefs. Yet, if challenged to provide concrete evidence to substantiate their claims, they will offer dubious research and resort to character assassination. It is imperative that we remain alert and skeptical of these tactics, and persist in our pursuit of honesty and transparency.
